headline: Checkly review
description: Checkly is a website monitoring tool built for developers. It can use Playwright and Puppeteer to monitor transaction workflows. Read our review of Checkly - a website monitoring tool.

offers.description: Limited browser and API tests per month
Enterprise plan with unlimited API and browser checks

negativeNotes: FTP, SSH, NTP monitors not supported
Arbitrary Javascript packages can not be used in tests
positiveNotes: Can manage monitoring configuration using Terraform
Run setup & teardown scripts before and after tests

author.name: Naman Singhal
author.description: Naman has a background in computer science and has published research with IEEE on predicting software bugs using machine learning models.

name: Website monitoring tool
reviewBody: Checkly is a website monitoring tool built specifically for developers. It has a clean and easy to use UI, but has powerful scripting capabilities so test plans can be written using the Playwright and Puppeteer frameworks. We particularly like the integration with Terraform to define monitoring configuration as code.
